mapper.select: SELECT l.id,l.min_amount,l.max_amount,l.name,l.update_date,l.insert_date,u1.name as updateUser,u2.name as insertUser FROM levels l LEFT JOIN users u1 on l.update_user = u1.id LEFT JOIN users u2 on l.insert_user = u2.id WHERE l.id = #{id}
